Name: Chip It Out
Descriptions: Proud to be a Mechanical Engineer? Then show it in the arena. Use the ever-so- dependable lathe to carve out the given model in the least time possible.
Rules: Participation can be individually or as a team of two
No additional work piece will be provided
Participants must complete work on time
The event will take place in 3 stages

First stage: A preliminary test(MCQ) will be conducted, which is purely practical based. In the 30 minutes duration participants will have to answer 20 questions. Three marks are awarded for each correct answer and one mark will deducted for wrong attempt. Elimination will be followed

Second stage: Lathe assembly. Participants must have the knowledge of each part of lathe and its working. A dismantled part needs to be assembled or corrected within the given time. Elimination will be followed
Third stage: In the final stage, participants will have to creatively build a model with help of given instructions in the given time using your skill
All students with a valid identity card from their respective educational institution and a valid DYUKSHA ID are eligible to participate in the event
Decision of organizers will be ﬁnal and binding on all
The organizers have full rights to call off the event if the required number of entries are not met, if that is the case the registered participants will be informed at the earliest
Change in rules, if any will be highlighted on the website and notiﬁed to the registered teams
